titles.title: Honoring the life, service, and accomplishments of General Robert H. Barrow, United States Marine Corps.
Honoring the life, service, and accomplishments of General Robert H. Barrow, United States Marine Corps.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: Honors General Robert H. Barrow for his 41 years of service to the United States, and commends him for his dedication and commitment to excellence as a Marine and leader of Marines.
